body: i was recently banned on a different server for doing some thing called a forced deathmatch could someone please tell me what that is.
body_tagged: i was recently banned on a different server for doing some thing called a forced deathmatch could someone please tell me what that is.
title: What is a forced deathmatch?

replies.body:
If you were playing Survival Games / Hunger Games, it is probably when you force the deathmatch to start.
Since Avicus does not have HG/SG, you would probably get better responses on that servers' forums.

replies.body: sounds like a legit tactic tbh
